data.persona: I am tired of working hard for the king. We work the most but get paid poorly. We are the engine of our society and without us things wouldnt work.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a A leather cloth, a skins, a statue of a god, a piece, a weapon, an armor, and a A copper vase here.
The book of spells and the a reluctant nun are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a rag.

data.mid_motivation: I need to make him pay for my suffering
data.long_motivation: I want to find a better paying job perhaps the prince would pay me better than his father

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get book of spells from storage area

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give blood to statue of a god
